verses.verse: הללו <WH1984> Praise יה <WH3050> ye the LORD. אודה <WH3034> I will praise יהוה <WH3068> the LORD בכל <WH3605> with whole לבב <WH3824> heart, בסוד <WH5475> in the assembly ישׁרים <WH3477> of the upright, ועדה׃ <WH5712> and the congregation.
גדלים <WH1419> great, מעשׂי <WH4639> The works יהוה <WH3068> of the LORD דרושׁים <WH1875> sought out לכל <WH3605> of all חפציהם׃ <WH2656> them that have pleasure
הוד <WH1935> honorable והדר <WH1926> and glorious: פעלו <WH6467> His work וצדקתו <WH6666> and his righteousness עמדת <WH5975> endureth לעד׃ <WH5703> forever.
זכר <WH2143> to be remembered: עשׂה <WH6213> He hath made לנפלאתיו <WH6381> his wonderful works חנון <WH2587> gracious ורחום <WH7349> and full of compassion. יהוה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
טרף <WH2964> meat נתן <WH5414> He hath given ליראיו <WH3373> unto them that fear יזכר <WH2142> be mindful לעולם <WH5769> him: he will ever בריתו׃ <WH1285> of his covenant.

כח <WH3581> the power מעשׂיו <WH4639> of his works, הגיד <WH5046> He hath showed לעמו <WH5971> his people לתת <WH5414> that he may give להם נחלת <WH5159> them the heritage גוים׃ <WH1471> of the heathen.
מעשׂי <WH4639> The works ידיו <WH3027> of his hands אמת <WH571> verity ומשׁפט <WH4941> and judgment; נאמנים <WH539> sure. כל <WH3605> all פקודיו׃ <WH6490> his commandments
סמוכים <WH5564> They stand fast לעד <WH5703> forever לעולם <WH5769> and ever, עשׂוים <WH6213> done באמת <WH571> in truth וישׁר׃ <WH3477> and uprightness.

פדות <WH6304> redemption שׁלח <WH7971> He sent לעמו <WH5971> unto his people: צוה <WH6680> he hath commanded לעולם <WH5769> forever: בריתו <WH1285> his covenant קדושׁ <WH6918> holy ונורא <WH3372> and reverend שׁמו׃ <WH8034> his name.

ראשׁית <WH7225> the beginning חכמה <WH2451> of wisdom: יראת <WH3374> The fear יהוה <WH3068> of the LORD שׂכל <WH7922> understanding טוב <WH2896> a good לכל <WH3605> have all עשׂיהם <WH6213> they that do תהלתו <WH8416> his praise עמדת <WH5975> endureth לעד׃ <WH5703> forever.
